jext.inputmanager

Input Manager

class InputManager;
Handles key presses, and navigating(sp) the text

this(LetterManager letterManager);
ctor with a LetterManager object

void setLetterBase(LetterBase letterBase);
Set the common base of LetterMan and this class

dchar doInput();
Main function for recieving key presses

void draw();
Draw cursor

@property ref auto letterBase();
access Letter Base object

@property ref auto letterManager();
access Letter Manager object

@property ref auto pos();
access cursor position
